abstract: Experts say the breakthrough holds the promise of being a big step forward in digital storage with a wide range of potential uses.
snippet: Experts say the breakthrough holds the promise of being a big step forward in digital storage with a wide range of potential uses.
lead_paragraph: General Electric says it has achieved a breakthrough in digital storage technology that will allow standard-size discs to hold the equivalent of 100 DVDs.

headline.main: G.E.’s Breakthrough Can Put 100 DVDs on a Disc
headline.print_headline: G.E.’s Breakthrough Can Put 100 DVDs on a Disc
